subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ko finished her first full season as a member of the L.P.G.A. Tour with a win at the Tour Championship on Sunday and a combined payday that was the richest in the tour’s history.
snippet: Ko finished her first full season as a member of the L.P.G.A. Tour with a win at the Tour Championship on Sunday and a combined payday that was the richest in the tour’s history.
